feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 4:46PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Rivers Rising Into This Weekend... Strong thunderstorms brought heavy rain to the Eastern Brooks Range Thursday night. This is now causing high water on rivers draining the Eastern Brooks Range, and rivers south of the mountains will continue rising this weekend. Water will cover gravel bars, and there is a chance of flooding.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:32PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Walker, northeastern Tuscaloosa, southwestern Jefferson and central Fayette Counties through 615 PM CDT... entry.title: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:25PM CDT until July 01 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR NORTHEASTERN TALLADEGA... SOUTHERN CALHOUN...SOUTHWESTERN CLEBURNE AND NORTHEASTERN CLAY COUNTIES IS CANCELLED... The storm which prompted the warning has weakened below severe limits. Therefore, the warning has been cancelled. However gusty winds and heavy rain are still possible with this thunderstorm.
